name: Walker, Appellant, v. Ohio River Company

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Walker, Appellant, v. Ohio River Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on the opinion of Judge Smart, as reported in 44 Pa. D. & C. 2d 200 (1967).
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Harry Alan Sherman, with him S. Eldridge Sampliner, for appellant.
Anthony J. Eolito, with him Harold R. Schmidt, and Rose, Schmidt & Dixon, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Walker, Appellant, v. Ohio River Company.
Argued January 11, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Harry Alan Sherman, with him S. Eldridge Sampliner, for appellant.
Anthony J. Eolito, with him Harold R. Schmidt, and Rose, Schmidt & Dixon, for appellee.
March 15, 1968:
